app_name: Groups Control Groups Messenger Apps SpiChat Lite
app_description: It s very simple to use. Just provide a username and a photo of yourself preferably then join any WiFi network and let the app discover other users on the same network. You can either be Online or Offline. You can invite others Online users to chat or send them Spy Messages in case they don t feel like chatting rigth now or you can send Spy Messages to Offline users. A Spy Message can contain both text and photo. Spy messages will remain archived until you actually decide to delete them. Remember thought you are allowed to send a limited number of Spy Messages per user! So think carefully what you want say or show! You can sign in with AppleID Google or Facebook. Have fun!! Only the full version of the App can process Spy Messages.
